projectGridLines.title: Content Analytics & Strategy
projectGridLines.description:
•             Ability to analyze data and come up with metrics that will help in data driven decision making

•             Ability to transform & manipulate data using Power Query, SQL or Excel

•             Visualize data by creating dashboards on MS Excel

•             Create informative presentations on MS PowerPoint to showcase learnings & insights to various stakeholders

•             Excellent problem solving skills

•             Presenting insights/thoughts/results to stakeholders

•             Effective communication

•             Regular updates to senior leadership and stakeholders

Basic Mathematics, Statistics & Introduction to Computer Science

Experience in data analytics, SQL or Power BI required (interns are expected to have basic knowledge of Power BI). Exposure to MS Excel & Powerpoint

During this project you will learn the following skills:

•             Problem solving & understanding of metrics

•             Advanced Analytical capabilities

•             Business understanding

•             Effective communication

•             Stakeholder Management
